title: gobuilder: should work with codereview plugin enabledÂ in .hgrc
body:
The freebsd-amd64 builder is in a loop:

$ go/bin/gobuilder -v freebsd-amd64
2012/03/13 09:20:49 Found old workspace, will use it
2012/03/13 09:20:49 dash GET todo map[packagePath:[] builder:[freebsd-amd64] goHash:[]
kind:[build-go-commit]] <nil>
2012/03/13 09:20:49 runLog [hg log --encoding=utf-8 --rev=7b88aab5cdb5 --limit=1
--template={node}]
2012/03/13 09:20:50 freebsd-amd64 building 7b88aab5cdb5f05978a48aac825e6a57b3433470
2012/03/13 09:20:50 mkdir /tmp/gobuilder/freebsd-amd64-7b88aab5cdb5: file exists

kind:[build-go-commit] packagePath:[]] <nil>
